text: Need Rowan Bailey for Mad Mex campaign. Budget around $30,383, looking for 1 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x LinkedIn post, 3 x 3-minute vlog, 1 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Brand photoshoot. 3 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 9 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
